identity.name: EUFSI LCA Tool
identity.aesthetic: Clinical Brutalism meets Swiss Design. High contrast, thin lines, structured grids, 'Blueprint' background textures.

usage.data_values: JetBrains Mono (Weights: 500). Use for ALL numerical inputs, LCA results, and table data. This separates 'Narrative' from 'Math'.

primary.description: EU Flag Blue. Use for primary buttons, active states, and key branding.

secondary.description: EU Stars Yellow. Use SPARINGLY for focus rings, 'recommended' tags, or high-priority alerts.

background.description: Slate-50. Very cool pale grey. NOT pure white.

surface.description: Pure white for cards and panels.

border.description: Slate-200. Subtle but visible structural lines.

blueprint_grid.description: A subtle engineering graph-paper background for empty spaces.

glassmorphism.usage: Sticky headers and floating summary panels only.

layout_strategy.dashboard: The 'Control Room' Grid. Fixed sidebar (w-64), scrollable main content. Top bar for context (Project Name / Breadcrumbs).
layout_strategy.wizard_form: Split Screen. Left: Progress Stepper (Sticky). Right: Form Inputs (Scrollable).
layout_strategy.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 or p-10 for main containers. Gap-6 for grids.

buttons.primary: bg-[#004494] hover:bg-[#003366] text-white rounded-md shadow-sm font-manrope font-semibold tracking-wide
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 font-manrope

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-lg shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

inputs.style: border-slate-200 focus:border-[#004494] focus:ring-[#004494] rounded-md font-mono text-sm bg-slate-50/50

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to use the EU Palette (Primary: #004494).
3. GLOBAL CSS: Add the 'blueprint_grid' pattern to the body background in index.css.
4. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, force 'font-mono' on all numerical inputs and table cells.
5. LAYOUT: Implement the 'Wizard' layout for the New Assessment page. Do not use a simple long scrolling form.
6. CHARTS: Use Recharts. Color palette for charts should be: #004494 (Primary), #FFD617 (Secondary), #10B981 (Success), #EF4444 (Danger), #64748B (Neutral).
7. TESTING: Add data-testid to all inputs (e.g., 'input-yarn-mass', 'select-industry').
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Keep it flat and clean.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all numbers. It makes the tool feel like a scientific instrument.
Always show units (kg, MJ, km) next to inputs in a muted grey color.
Validation errors should be bold and red (#EF4444), appearing instantly.
